mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JST_MEMBER ( emp_id, name, phone, password, remark, register_time, update_time, card_no, status, charge_amount, extra_amount, expense_amount, balance_amount, canceled_time ) VALUES ( #{empId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{remark}, #{registerTime}, #{updateTime}, #{cardNo}, #{status}, #{chargeAmount}, #{extraAmount}, #{expenseAmount}, #{balanceAmount}, #{cancelledTime} );
mapper.update: UPDATE JST_MEMBER SET emp_id = #{empId}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, password = #{password}, remark = #{remark}, update_time = #{updateTime}, card_no = #{cardNo}, status = #{status}, extra_amount=#{extraAmount}, charge_amount = #{chargeAmount}, expense_amount = #{expenseAmount}, canceled_time = #{cancelledTime}, balance_amount = #{balanceAmount} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM JST_MEMBER WHERE status=0 AND name LIKE '%${name}%' OR card_no LIKE '%${name}%'
SELECT id FROM JST_MEMBER WHERE status=0 ORDER BY register_time LIMIT #{start}, #{num}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JST_MEMBER WHERE status=0
mapper.update: UPDATE JST_MEMBER SET status=1 WHERE id=#{id}
